detaileddescription.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished through SWATT. The test cases are based on this design, and also cover the configuration options. SW Unit testing is accomplished through SWATT. The test cases are based on this design, and also cover the configuration options. Expected test coverage (100%) and type of test coverage (C1). For more details go to Test List section.

sect1.title: Verification by Review
sect1.para: The review is available in git. Any points linked to JIRA tickes, see History section

sect1.title: Verification by Testing
sect1.para: The tests are created using SWATT and are available in *.c.test files. The test files can be found under File section.
